Html: I'm thinking that you guy should make down loadable addons for the Rawr Progie that will have all of the Items in the game from lvl 1 to 85... Cause I a few people that would love to be able to run rawr on low lvl toons...

That's not really the point of Rawr.  It's designed as a way to optimize the end-game PVE experience.  At this point, the time it takes to run through a setup a character, I've already gained enough levels to have it not matter anymore.

Not to mention that mechanics, abilities, talents available change every level, meaning every spec would have to be re-modeled for each level - compared to just doing level 85 - it would be a crazy amount of work and effort!

 

Just download Pawn and put in rough values for the important stats.   Eg. for my mage I used Int=1, Spellpower=0.7, crit, hit, haste, mastery = 0.5

This is more than good enough to get you to 80+, then you can start worrying about the values at 85 and work towards them.
